<title level="1" pfs="">[Ruanna Nyamma](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2016)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 29

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Ruanna Nyamma](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2016)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 17</row>

**Perception** +9; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +11, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +11, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +6, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +14, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[Kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [_persona mask_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=451), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (20 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 66

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
kukri +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +11 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 19, attack +12
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) (3 slots)

**Bard Composition Spells 2 Focus Points,** DC 21
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Inspire Competence](/Spells.aspx?ID=385), [Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386)
- **2nd**
[Counter Performance](/Spells.aspx?ID=381), [Lingering Composition](/Spells.aspx?ID=389)

**Elaborate Feint** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Ruanna attempts to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) using [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) rather than [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5). On a success, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to any melee attack, not just Ruanna's. Ruanna then Strides.

</column>
name: Ruanna Nyamma
